actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that no bill shall be engrossed or enrolled which a majority of members present and voting cannot attest having read.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that no bill shall be engrossed or enrolled which has not been read by a majority of Members present and voting for such bill.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that no bill shall be engrossed or enrolled which a majority of members present and voting cannot attest having read.
